description: Quotients of consecutive values of lcm of first n triangular numbers (A000217).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a051543 n = a051542_list !! (n-1)a051543_list = zipWith div (tail a025555_list) a025555_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 12 2014
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu)
extensions: Corrected and extended by _James A. Sellers_
